label: TiddlyWiki
Description1: An customisable, extensible, self-contained wiki that runs anywhere -- the browser, under Node.js, Amazon Lambda.
Description2:
TiddlyWiki ships as a self-contained way to take notes, but really it's about enabling people to build custom web applications without needing conventional web development skills.

TiddlyWiki is interesting in the context of decentralised architectures because of its self contained nature, without any dependencies. Ten years ago Zooko was experimenting with it for the Least Authority Filing System project, and now TiddlyWiki is being explored on Beaker Browser by a new generation of hackers.
description:
#a non-linear personal web notebook
##About TiddlyWiki
![About TiddlyWiki](https://www.youtube.com/embed/KtCUr83XgyE)
 ###An customisable, extensible, self-contained wiki that runs anywhere -- the browser, under Node.js, Amazon Lambda.
TiddlyWiki ships as a self-contained way to take notes, but really it's about enabling people to build custom web applications without needing conventional web development skills.

TiddlyWiki is interesting in the context of decentralised architectures because of its self contained nature, without any dependencies. Ten years ago Zooko was experimenting with it for the Least Authority Filing System project, and now TiddlyWiki is being explored on Beaker Browser by a new generation of hackers.
